metadata.title: CVE-2020-35342 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU Binutils before 2.34 has an uninitialized-heap vulnerability infunction tic4x_print_cond (file opcodes/tic4x-dis.c) which could allowattackers to make an information leak.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1').
